activities: Travelport will use or otherwise process personal information received about European Travelers in order to provide travel related services to travel suppliers, travel agents, and other entities operating in the travel industry.  For these purposes, a European Traveler is a traveler whose personal data is entered in a Travelport GDS by a travel agency, corporate travel department, or similar entity located in the EU or Switzerland, regardless of the traveler’s nationality or location.
contactoff1: 10 Hurricane Way, Langley, Berkshire, SL3 8AG, UK
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data about European Travelers in a Travelport global distribution system / travel commerce platform.
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
